title: Newark East Side holds off Newark Central behind Cadena, Delacruz
content: Cadena and Delacruz combine for 49 points to lead Red Raiders past Central. Amari Delacruz of Newark East Side grabs a rebound against Clifford Deguerre of Arts during the boys basketball game at Arts HS in Newark, NJ on Saturday, December 16, 2023.Adrian Cadena scored 25 points and Amari Delacruz added 24 points and 13 rebounds as Newark East Side defeated Newark Central, 59-53, in a SEC-Liberty division matchup in the Central Ward of Newark. The Red Raiders jumped out to an early lead, outscoring Central 20-14 in the first quarter and extending their advantage to 38-24 by halftime. Cadena hit five three-pointers and added three steals to lead East Side. Newark Central attempted to rally in the second half, outscoring East Side 29-21 over the final two quarters, but couldn’t overcome the 14-point halftime deficit. Yasin Diggs-Saleem led Central with 14 rebounds while Marcus Watson and Sekou Jabateh each scored 13 points. Jabateh grabbed 14 rebounds. Tamir Davis Jr. contributed 11 points, eight rebounds and five assists. East Side’s strong first-half performance proved to be the difference as they held on despite being outscored 16-10 in the fourth quarter. Delacruz was a force inside with 13 rebounds in his 24-point performance.The Advance Local Express Desk uses AI tools to assist in producing content, which is reviewed and edited by staff. title: Controversial blogger Musa Khawula named in Madlanga Commission
content: Just weeks prior to the arrest of controversial blogger Musa Khawula, he had planned to publish information relating to Vusimuzi “Cat” Matlala's private and business affairs. However, Gauteng head of organised crime Richard Shibiri approached Khawula and pleaded with the blogger not to post the story on Matlala. WhatsApp messages between Shibiri and Khawula were presented before the Madlanga Commission. In one of the messages, Shibiri requests Khawula not to publish the story on Matlala, describing him as “a good guy” who “never bothers anyone” and “lives a private life”. Witness F claims that suspended Deputy National Police Commissioner, Shadrack Sibiya, instructed him to send Khawula’s warrant of arrest to Matlala. "According to General Sibiya, Mr Matala’s security company always has vision of where Musa usually goes on weekends. I did not see any problem with it because usually SAPS do work with private security."

title: 消えたカツオ 元常務に懲役3年求刑
Deprem sonrası Kahramanmaraş’ta meslek liseleri üretimle güçlendi
content: 6 Şubat 2023’te meydana gelen depremlerden en ağır etkilenen illerden biri olan Kahramanmaraş’ta, eğitim altyapısında yaşanan ciddi hasara rağmen mesleki ve teknik Anadolu liseleri üretim faaliyetlerini sürdürerek dikkat çekici bir başarıya imza attı. Kentte döner sermaye işletmesi bulunan meslek liseleri, hem eğitimi aksatmadı hem de üretimle ekonomiye katkı sağladı. Kahramanmaraş İl Milli Eğitim Müdürlüğü bünyesinde faaliyet gösteren 12 mesleki ve teknik Anadolu lisesinde, deprem sonrası süreçte eğitim öğretim devam ederken öğrenciler üretim faaliyetlerinde aktif rol aldı. Okullarda mobilya, metal, elektrik-elektronik, bilişim, tekstil ile yiyecek ve içecek hizmetleri alanlarında yapılan üretimler, öğrencilerin mesleki becerilerini geliştirmesine imkan tanıdı. Atölyelerde yürütülen bu çalışmalar, yalnızca öğrencilerin uygulamalı eğitim kazanmasını değil, aynı zamanda kentin ekonomik toparlanma sürecine katkı sunulmasını da sağladı. DÖNER SERMAYE GELİRLERİNDE HIZLI ARTIŞ Kahramanmaraş İl Milli Eğitim Müdürlüğü Mesleki ve Teknik Eğitim Şube Müdürü Menderes İbik, meslek liselerinin deprem sonrası süreçte üretim faaliyetlerini kararlılıkla sürdürdüğünü vurguladı. Eğitim altyapısının büyük zarar görmesine rağmen üretim kapasitesinin her yıl artırıldığını belirten İbik, döner sermaye gelirlerindeki yükselişe dikkat çekti. Mesleki ve Teknik Eğitim Şube Müdürlüğü koordinasyonunda faaliyet gösteren 12 meslek lisesinin döner sermaye gelirleri son yıllarda önemli bir artış gösterdi. Buna göre gelirler, 2021 yılında 6 milyon 573 bin lira seviyesindeyken, 2022’de 12 milyon 175 bin liraya çıktı. 2023’te 20 milyon lirayı aşan gelirler, 2024’te 48 milyon lirayı geçti. 2025 yılında ise döner sermaye gelirleri yaklaşık 55 milyon liraya ulaştı. ÖĞRENCİLER HEM KAZANDI HEM TECRÜBE EDİNDİ İbik, öğrencilerin üretim süreçlerine doğrudan katıldığını ve döner sermayeden pay aldığını belirterek, bu modelin mezuniyet sonrası istihdam açısından büyük önem taşıdığını ifade etti. Üretim odaklı eğitim sayesinde öğrencilerin iş disiplinini erken yaşta kazandığını vurgulayan İbik, meslek liselerinin deprem sonrası toparlanma sürecinde kritik bir rol üstlendiğini dile getirdi.

title: "Return to Silent Hill": Videospiel-Adaption mit Bezug zu Bayern
content: Mit "Return to Silent Hill" erscheint die dritte Kino-Umsetzung der Videospiel-Vorlage. Zurück an Bord ist Regisseur Christophe Gans.Neben der "Resident Evil"-Reihe gelten unter horroraffinen Gamern die "Silent Hill"-Spiele als Gradmesser für immersiven Grusel. Allen voran der zweite Teil aus dem Jahr 2001 hob die erzählerische und atmosphärische Dichte auf ein neues Level und ließ manch Zocker staunen - Videospiele können eine derartig emotionale Geschichte erzählen?Ab dem 5. Februar erscheint mit "Return to Silent Hill" eine Kino-Adaption, die sich der bahnbrechenden Story von vor 25 Jahren annimmt. Verantwortlich dafür zeichnet ein Regisseur, der sich bestens mit den nebelverhangenen Gassen der unheilvollen Kleinstadt Silent Hill auskennt - Christophe Gans ("Pakt der Wölfe"), der vor genau zwei Jahrzehnten schon die erste "Silent Hill"-Verfilmung auf die Leinwand gebracht hat. Worum geht es in "Return to Silent Hill" und was hat der darin gezeigte Vorhof zur Hölle mit der bayerischen Idylle am Walchensee zu tun?Nachricht einer Toten - darum geht esEin mysteriöser Brief erreicht James Sunderland (Jeremy Irvine) mit einer unfassbaren Nachricht: Mary (Hannah Emily Anderson), seine Frau, die er längst für tot hielt, könnte noch leben. Völlig erschüttert macht er sich auf den Weg nach Silent Hill, wohin ihn die rätselhafte Botschaft führt.Was er dort vorfindet, ist eine finstere Schattenwelt voller Geheimnisse, in der die Realität trügt. Während er verzweifelt nach der Wahrheit sucht, lauert ihm auf den nebelverhangenen Straßen ein namenloses Entsetzen auf - und eine schockierende Erkenntnis, die seinen Verstand an die Grenze des Erträglichen treibt. Kann er das Rätsel um Mary lüften?Ein guter StartMit seinem ersten filmischen Ausflug nach Silent Hill wusste Gans durchaus zu überzeugen. Videospiel-Verfilmungen galten zu diesem Zeitpunkt als zumeist grauenvoller Trash. Seine Vision von "Silent Hill" stellte eine zwar nicht fehlerfreie, aber dennoch überraschend gute Ausnahme dar.Ein gänzlich anderes Bild beim 2012 erschienenen zweiten Teil "Silent Hill: Revelation". Trotz starkem Cast (unter anderem Kit Harington, Sean Bean und Carrie-Anne Moss) fiel der Streifen von Regisseurin M. J. Bassett beim Kinopublikum und erst recht bei Fans der Vorlage krachend durch. Die bisherige Zuschauerresonanz aus den USA lässt leider vermuten, dass "Return to Silent Hill" ein ähnliches Schicksal droht - bei der Bewertungsplattform "Rotten...

title: Roger Craig may beat fellow 49ers great Frank Gore to Hall of Fame
content: SAN FRANCISCO – Joe Montana threw around his certified clout in summing up Roger Craig’s influence on the 49ers’ Team of the ’80s.“He meant everything to that offense,” Montana said.Craig and Frank Gore, two of the greatest running backs to wear the 49ers uniform, are finalists to slip on a Pro Football Hall of Fame gold jacket this summer.This year’s class will be revealed Thursday night at NFL Honors, even though it was selected Jan. 13 by the 50-member voting committee.Craig’s 32-year wait is increasingly expected to end. A Seniors finalist, he seemingly should emerge after ESPN reported first-ballot snubs of Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft, the former New England Patriots power duo who were coach and owner finalists in the same voting quadrant.For Gore, he also could be overlooked as a first-ballot finalist, even though the NFL’s third all-time leading rusher will inevitably be invited to Canton.Craig, 65, advanced in 2010 and 2020 as a modern-era finalist. He has maintained a low profile in recent years, and although he joined former 49ers greats for a San Francisco dinner last week, he steered clear of joining them at last Tuesday’s “Rise of the 49ers” premiere in the Mission district.“It’s so overdue,” Montana said last week of Craig’s Hall of Fame case. “There’s another guy in there that has done what he’s done and there’s no reason he shouldn’t be there. Hopefully they give him his due respect and he gets in. We’re all pulling for him.”Craig was an NFL pioneer as the first player to produce 1,000 yards both rushing and receiving in a season, in 1985. Only 2011 Hall of Fame inductee Marshall Faulk (1999 Rams) and Christian McCaffrey (2019 Panthers) have matched that feat, and McCaffrey nearly did so again this season on the 49ers (1,202 rushing yards, 924 receiving).“There’s a guy that wasn’t just a runner,” Montana added of Craig. “He’s like a wide receiver catching passes out of the backfield. Today, they’d even split him out and let him run routes out there. That’s the kind of player he is.”As Montana gathered last week with fellow stars from the 49ers’ 1980s dynasty for a screening of AMC’s “Rise of the 49ers” docuseries, several others sang Craig’s praises, as they had done at a dinner with him the previous night.“I remember the first time I came to the Niners, he took me to ‘The Hill.’ It hurt me,” Jerry Rice said of a training run on the Peninsula. “I actually stayed away for a couple of days, then I said I have to go back and conquer that...

TOKİ KIRŞEHİR KURA SONUÇLARI 4 ŞUBAT 2026 || Kırşehir 1633 sosyal konut TOKİ Kırşehir kura çekimi sonuçları nereden, nasıl öğrenil
content: TOKİ Kırşehir kura çekilişi YouTube canlı yayını sonrası asil ve yedek aday isim listesi belli olacak. Bakanlıktan yapılan açıklamaya göre, Toplu Konut İdaresi (TOKİ) Başkanlığının hayata geçirdiği Yüzyılın Konut Projesi'nin kura çekimlerinde sıra Kırşehir kura çekilişine geldi. Yeni haftanın takvimine göre, 4 Şubat Çarşamba günü Kırşehir'de 1633 konut kura çekilişi canlı yayında yapılacak. Çekilişin ardından ise TOKİ Kırşehir kura sonuçları yedek ve asil aday isim listesi vatandaşlar tarafından takip edilecek. Peki, Kırşehir TOKİ kura çekimi sonuçları açıklandı mı, TOKİ Kırşehir kura sonuçları nereden öğrenilir? İşte, ayrıntılar. TOKİ KIRŞEHİR KURASI NE ZAMAN? TOKİ 500 bin konut projesi kura çekilişinde sıra Kırşehir'e geldi. Yeni haftanın takvimine göre, Kırşehir 1633 konut kura çekilişi, 4 Şubat 2026 Çarşamba günü saat 11.00'da gerçekleşecek. Çekiliş Neşet Ertaş Kültür ve Sanat Merkezi'nde yapılacak. Çekiliş YouTube ekranı üzerinden canlı yayınlanacak. TOKİ KURA SONUÇLARI NASIL VE NEREDEN ÖĞRENİLECEK? Kura çekilişleri sonrası asil ve yedek hak sahipleri listesi yayımlandığında, vatandaşlar sonuçları iki ana kanal üzerinden sorgulayabilecek: TOKİ Resmi İnternet Sitesi: (www.toki.gov.tr) e-Devlet Kapısı: (www.turkiye.gov.tr) Adaylar, T.C. kimlik numaraları ile giriş yaparak hak sahipliği durumlarını kontrol edebilecekler. TOKİ KURA SONUÇLARI SORGULAMA EKRANI İÇİN TIKLAYINIZ TOKİ İLLERE GÖRE KONUT KONTENJANI DAĞILIMI 81 ilde hayata geçirilecek 500 bin konutun illere göre dağılımı ise şöyle: "Adana'da 12 bin 292, Adıyaman'da 6 bin 620, Afyonkarahisar'da 4 bin 370, Ağrı'da 2 bin 840, Aksaray'da 2 bin 476, Amasya'da 2 bin 601, Ankara'da 30 bin 823, Antalya'da 13 bin 213, Ardahan'da 619, Artvin'de 1020, Aydın'da 7 bin 123, Balıkesir'de 7 bin 548, Bartın'da 1240, Batman'da 3 bin 810, Bayburt'ta 723, Bilecik'te 1419, Bingöl'de 2 bin 72, Bitlis'te 2 bin 363, Bolu'da 1950, Burdur'da 2 bin 208, Bursa'da 17 bin 225, Çanakkale'de 3 bin 376, Çankırı'da 1753, Çorum'da 2 bin 867, Denizli'de 6 bin 190, Diyarbakır'da 12 bin 165, Düzce'de 2 bin 470, Edirne'de 2 bin 530, Elazığ'da 3 bin 685, Erzincan'da 1760, Erzurum'da 4 bin 905, Eskişehir'de 6 bin 25, Gaziantep'te 13 bin 890, Giresun'da 1576, Gümüşhane'de 926, Hakkari'de 1557, Hatay'da 12 bin 639, Iğdır'da 1200, Isparta'da 2 bin 889, İstanbul'da 100 bin, İzmir'de 21 bin 20, Kahramanmaraş'ta 8 bin 195,...

title: VIDEO | Relato de la “Hondureña Españolizada” destapa estafas a migrantes en España
content: Rosy Antúnez, conocida en TikTok como «Hondureña Españolizada», se ha convertido en una voz viral que combina humor con una denuncia social directa. Detrás de su particular forma de hablar —marcada por modismos españoles adquiridos tras años de residencia en España— hay una historia de estafa, vulnerabilidad y supervivencia que ella misma decidió contar para alertar a otros migrantes.Su testimonio, difundido a través de un video en redes sociales, expone los riesgos que enfrentan muchas personas que migran sin redes de apoyo, con altas expectativas y escasa información sobre el país de destino.En su relato, Antúnez cuenta que viajó desde Honduras tras contratar un “servicio de recepción” ofrecido por una agencia: por 3 mil euros, una persona le garantizaba recogida en el aeropuerto, alojamiento y ayuda para conseguir empleo. Sin familiares ni conocidos en España, aceptó la oferta.La llegada a España y el inicio del engañoLa persona que supuestamente la recibiría nunca se presentó en el aeropuerto y solo le envió una dirección en Alcobendas, Madrid. Antúnez llegó en taxi, pagando 120 euros por un trayecto que, según relata, suele costar alrededor de 30.Al arribar al lugar, se encontró con un alojamiento precario: tres mujeres hacinadas en una sola habitación, sin camas y con deficiente calefacción. Poco después, la mujer que ofrecía el “servicio” les exigió los mil euros en efectivo que llevaban como requisito inicial, dejándolas sin recursos.Según su testimonio, también les vendió teléfonos móviles básicos a sobreprecio y las llevó a una institución benéfica para gestionar oportunidades laborales, con la condición de que los primeros salarios le serían entregados. La alimentación era limitada y la situación de dependencia, total.Antúnez relata que el desespero las llevó incluso a considerar regresar a su país de origen.Tras recibir orientación de personas externas que les advirtieron que estaban siendo explotadas, las jóvenes decidieron marcharse y buscar alojamiento por su cuenta. La respuesta de la mujer fue amenazarlas con denunciar su situación migratoria ante la policía.Reacciones en redes: entre la empatía y la críticaAdemás del contenido del testimonio, la creadora de contenido ha recibido comentarios centrados en su forma de hablar, una mezcla entre acento hondureño y expresiones del español peninsular. Mientras una parte de los usuarios le pide que continúe contando su historia, otros se...

SoFi CEO drops a bombshell after blowout earnings
content: SoFi’s Q4 2025 earnings is not simply “a record quarter.” At a very important earnings call, management played offense, telling investors to avoid lumping it with rate-sensitive fintech lenders.CEO Anthony Noto set the tone early in the call:But Noto was more optimistic regarding the future. He wants the market to incorporate a unique situation into its future projections. A fintech is evolving into more than a money lender, moving into fees, distribution, and infrastructure.Additionally, the punchline should not be overlooked. “Total fee-based revenue... was a quarterly record at $443 million.” He described it as “deliberate diversification towards more capital-light revenue streams.” SoFi’s Q4 earnings were strong but here’s what could trip up SOFI stockPhoto by Bloomberg on Getty Images SoFi Q4 2025 highlights investors should pin to the boardA few numbers do most of the work in the “platform, not lender” argument:Adjusted net revenue:Around $1.013B (first billion-dollar quarter)Adjusted EBITDA: Roughly $318M (31% margin)Fee-based revenue:$443M (up 50%+ YoY)LPB originations:$3.7BTotal originations:$10.5BDeposits:$37.5B (+$4.6B QoQ)Members:13.7M (+35% YoY)Products:20M+ (+37% YoY)CFO Chris Lapointe said it best, stating how things are evolving with respect to the fintech: “An important driver... was the increased contribution from capital light, non-lending, and fee-based revenue sources.”Fee-based revenue is a mix shift that changes the conversationWhen it comes to SoFi, there is a default risk that we have to deal with. Credit rates can become concerning due to the current state of the US economy. However, when that happens, SoFi stock gets treated like a lender.More Personal Finance:Why selling a home to your child for a dollar can backfireElon Musk says ‘universal high income’ is comingFTC, 21 states sue Uber over ‘shady’ subscription billingTrump’s bold new tax promise has families asking one big questionSoFi Bank Shakes Up Subscription Product, Launches New Charge CardWhat is the workaround for SoFi? Well, for management it is simple: the scaling of fees. At a certain point, they will be impossible to ignore. Noto said fee-based revenue is at “nearly $1.8 billion” annualized, jumping from “less than $1.2 billion” a year ago. This increase further suggested that the change was intentional.Related: Galaxy A57 leak drops shocker for Samsung’s most important phoneSo, fees aren’t just a “nice” side distraction. As time goes forward, they are becoming...

title: Туризм в Грузии: средняя цена на отель в январе 2026 года выросла на 9%
content: По данным Исследовательского центра PMC, в январе индекс цен на гостиницы в Грузии снизился на 0,8% по сравнению с предыдущим месяцем, однако вырос почти на 9% в годовом исчислении (по сравнению с январем 2025 года). В январе 2026 года средняя цена за проживание в гостевых домах составляла 107 лари, в 3-звездочных отелях — 152 лари, а в 4-звездочных отелях — 229 лари. Что касается 5-звездочных отелей, то средняя цена в этом сегменте составила 416 лари. По данным Исследовательского центра PMC, самая высокая средняя цена на 5-звездочные отели была в Мцхета-Мтианети — 1016 лари, в Тбилиси — 535 лари и в Кахетии — 518 лари. Согласно отчету, в январе 2026 года индекс цен на 3-, 4- и 5-звездочные отели снизился на 2,3% по сравнению с предыдущим месяцем, а индекс цен на гостевые дома снизился на 5,7%. В целом индекс цен на гостиницы в январе 2026 года снизился на 0,8% по сравнению с декабрем 2025 года. В годовом исчислении в январе индекс цен на 3-, 4- и 5-звездочные отели составил вырос на 10,4% по сравнению с предыдущим годом, а индекс цен на гостиницы типа «хостел» вырос на 4,4%. В целом индекс цен на гостиницы в январе 2026 года вырос на 8,9% по сравнению с январем 2025 года. Средняя цена, представленная в исследовании, была получена путем мониторинга цен на стандартные двухместные номера в 3-, 4- и 5-звездочных, а также семейных отелях в 10 регионах Грузии и в Тбилиси. Анализ включает 568 стратифицированных, случайно выбранных 3-, 4- и 5-звездочных отелей и 371 семейный отель, зарегистрированных на booking.com. Средние цены рассчитаны на основе отелей, доступных в текущем месяце.

title: В 2025 году в Тбилиси было продано недвижимости на $3,5 млрд
content: В 2025 году в Тбилиси было продано 42 388 квартир на сумму 3,5 млрд долларов. По сравнению с 2024 годом общий объем рынка вырос на 12,6%. Согласно обзору Galt & Taggart, на первичном рынке было продано 21 000 квартир на сумму 1,783 млрд долларов, а на вторичном рынке — 21 400 квартир на сумму 1,788 млрд долларов. Согласно обновленному обзору Galt & Taggart, цены на недвижимость в Тбилиси выросли как на первичном, так и на вторичном рынках, а средняя стоимость квадратного метра достигла 1373 долларов. В столице самые дорогие объекты недвижимости в прошлом году находились в районах Мтацминда, Ваке и Чугурети. В течение первых девяти месяцев 2025 года темпы роста цен на первичном рынке были низкими (0,2% в месяц), однако на фоне восстановления спроса и сокращения количества выданных разрешений на строительство рост ускорился до 0,7% в месяц в четвертом квартале 2025 года. В результате средняя цена на первичном рынке выросла на 4,0% в годовом исчислении, что свидетельствует о стабилизации темпов роста по сравнению с 2024 годом (+11,6% г/г) и 2023 годом (+20,2% г/г). В декабре 2025 года средняя цена на вторичном рынке (новые здания с разрешениями на строительство, выданными с 2013 года) выросла на 7,9% в годовом исчислении», — говорится в обзоре. В Galt & Taggart отмечают, что в 2025 году усиление конкуренции привело к замедлению темпов роста цен и побудило застройщиков максимально оптимизировать свои внутренние схемы рассрочки платежей. Инвестиционный банк прогнозирует однозначный рост цен на квартиры в 2026 году. «В 2026 году мы ожидаем, что спрос останется на уровне 2025 года, чему будут способствовать такие фундаментальные факторы, как урбанизация, сокращение среднего размера семьи и высокая доходность аренды. Мы ожидаем, что однозначный рост цен на недвижимость продолжится, в значительной степени завися от изменений со стороны предложения. Запуск продаж крупных запланированных проектов и сохранение высокого уровня выданных разрешений могут увеличить риски переизбытка предложения на рынке и затруднить рост цен», — отмечается в обзоре.

title: В 2025 году выработка электроэнергии на ГЭС в Грузии снизилась на 3,1%
content: В Грузии подавляющая часть электроэнергии, производимой на местном уровне, поступает от гидроэлектростанций. В общей сложности 113 гидроэлектростанций поставляют электроэнергию в государственную электросеть, совокупная выработка которых в прошлом году составила 11 миллиардов киловатт-часов. Этот объем электроэнергии на 3,1% ниже по сравнению с 2024 годом, что связано с изменениями уровня воды в реках и сокращением количества осадков. Несмотря на ввод в эксплуатацию в прошлом году ГЭС «Хоби 2» мощностью 44,5 МВт и ГЭС «Мтквари» мощностью 54 МВт, общий объем выработки электроэнергии все же сократился, в основном из-за снижения выработки крупных гидроэлектростанций — ГЭС «Варцихе»; ГЭС «Варднили»; ГЭС «Риони» и ГЭС «Гумати» ГЭС. В то же время, выработка «Ингури» ГЭС в прошлом году увеличилась на 0,8% и составила 3,4 млрд кВт-ч.

title: بدء اجتماعات اللجنة الأردنية الباكستانية المشتركة
content: جريدة الغد انطلقت في العاصمة الباكستانية إسلام آباد، الأربعاءأعمال الاجتماعات التحضيرية الفنية للدورة العاشرة للجنة الوزارية الأردنية–الباكستانية المشتركة، بمشاركة ممثلي الجهات المعنية من كلا البلدين، وذلك في إطار التحضير لانعقاد اجتماعات اللجنة الوزارية على المستوى الوزاري. اضافة اعلان وترأست الاجتماعات عن الجانب الأردني الأمينة العامة لوزارة الصناعة والتجارة والتموين دانا الزعبي، فيما ترأستها عن الجانب الباكستاني سابينا قريشي، كبيرة أمناء وزارة الشؤون الاقتصادية الباكستانية، حيث جرى استعراض ملفات التعاون القائمة وبحث أولويات المرحلة المقبلة. وأكدت الزعبي أن الاجتماعات التحضيرية تهدف إلى تهيئة الأرضية اللازمة لاجتماعات اللجنة الوزارية، من خلال مناقشة مجالات التعاون الاقتصادي ذات الاهتمام المشترك، وبخاصة التجارة والاستثمار، وتحديد الفرص المتاحة لتطوير التعاون في قطاعات الصناعة والزراعة والطاقة والخدمات، إلى جانب بحث سبل تيسير التبادل التجاري ومعالجة التحديات القائمة. ومن المقرر أن يترأس وزير الصناعة والتجارة والتموين يعرب القضاة، ووزير التجارة في حكومة جمهورية باكستان الإسلامية جام كمال خان، يوم الخميس، اجتماعات الدورة العاشرة للجنة الوزارية المشتركة، والتي ستشهد التوقيع على محضر أعمال اللجنة من قبل الرئيسين المشاركين، إضافة إلى التوقيع على مذكرة تفاهم في مجال تكنولوجيا المعلومات والاتصالات بين حكومة البلدين، وذلك في إطار تعزيز التعاون الثنائي بين البلدين.
creator: الغد الإخباري

title: Battal Gazi’nin Zıpzıp’ıydı... Necdet Kökeş'e son veda!
content: Türk sinemasının emektar isimlerinden, Battal Gazi serisinde canlandırdığı “Zıpzıp” karakteriyle hafızalara kazınan Necdet Kökeş, 82 yaşında hayata veda etti. Geçirdiği kalp krizi sonrası yoğun bakıma alınarak entübe edilen usta oyuncu, tüm müdahalelere rağmen kurtarılamadı. Yeşilçam’ın sessiz ama iz bırakan yüzlerinden biri olan Kökeş, Cüneyt Arkın’la birlikte rol aldığı Battal Gazi filmleri başta olmak üzere birçok yapımda izleyiciyle buluşmuştu. Sanat hayatı boyunca sayısız projede yer alan Kökeş’in vefat haberi, sinema dünyasında derin bir üzüntü yarattı. Hayatını kaybetmeden kısa süre önce kaydedilen son görüntüleri ortaya çıkan Necdet Kökeş, bu karelerle sevenlerini bir kez daha hüzne boğdu. Sağlık sorunlarıyla uzun süredir mücadele ettiği bilinen usta oyuncunun durumu, geçirdiği kalp krizi ve ardından yaşanan komplikasyonlarla ağırlaşmıştı. Necdet Kökeş için bugün Taksim’deki Atlas Sineması’nda bir anma töreni düzenlendi. Törende, sanat camiasından birçok isim hazır bulunurken, Kökeş’in sinemaya bıraktığı izler ve anılar duygusal anlara sahne oldu. Kökeş, Taksim Camii'nde öğle namazı sonrası kılınacak cenaze namazının ardından Ayazağa Mezarlığı'nda son yolculuğuna uğurlandı.
creator: cnn türk

title: एक्सप्रेवेवर प्रचंड मोठी वाहतूक कोंडी अन् २५ किलोमीटर पर्यंत रांगा; नेमकं पुण्यात घडलं काय ?
content: लोणावळा : मुंबई–पुणे द्रुतगती महामार्गावर मंगळवारी सायंकाळी घडलेल्या एका अपघातामुळे संपूर्ण मार्गावर वाहतुकीचा मोठा खोळंबा झाला. आडोशी बोगद्याच्या परिसरात ज्वलनशील वायूची वाहतूक करणारा टँकर उलटल्याने सुरक्षिततेच्या कारणास्तव महामार्गावरील वाहतूक दीर्घकाळासाठी थांबवावी लागली. या घटनेचा परिणाम म्हणून महामार्गावर दोन्ही बाजूंनी वाहनांच्या लांबच लांब रांगा लागल्या असून, अनेक प्रवासी अनेक तास अडकून पडले आहेत. मिळालेल्या माहितीनुसार, पुण्याकडून मुंबईच्या दिशेने जाणारा हा टँकर एका तीव्र वळणावर चालकाच्या नियंत्रणाबाहेर गेला आणि बोगद्याच्या प्रवेशाजवळ पलटी झाला. टँकरमध्ये असलेल्या वायूची गळती सुरू झाली. संभाव्य धोका लक्षात घेऊन प्रशासनाने तातडीने खबरदारीचा उपाय म्हणून मुंबईकडे जाणारी वाहतूक पूर्णपणे रोखली, तर पुण्याकडील वाहतूकही मर्यादित स्वरूपात चालू ठेवण्यात आली. अपघातानंतर सुमारे आठ तास महामार्गावर वाहतूक पूर्णतः ठप्प होती. मध्यरात्रीनंतर धोका काही प्रमाणात कमी झाल्यानंतर टँकर बाजूला घेण्यात आला आणि एका लेनवरून वाहतूक सुरू करण्यात आली. मात्र, वाहतुकीचा वेग अत्यंत संथ असल्याने वाहनांच्या रांगा अजूनही कमी झालेल्या नाहीत. या घटनेमुळे मुंबई–पुणे द्रुतगती मार्गासह जुना पुणे–मुंबई महामार्गावरही मोठ्या प्रमाणात कोंडी झाली आहे. काही ठिकाणी वाहनांच्या रांगा २० ते २५ किलोमीटरपर्यंत पोहोचल्याची माहिती आहे. अनेक प्रवासी पहाटेपासून एकाच ठिकाणी अडकून असल्याने संताप व्यक्त करत आहेत. काही प्रवाशांच्या विमान प्रवासाच्या वेळा चुकल्या असून, उपचारासाठी निघालेले रुग्ण आणि मालवाहतूक करणारी वाहनेही या कोंडीत अडकली आहेत. वाहतूक कोंडीत अडकलेल्या नागरिकांना पाणी, अन्न आणि स्वच्छतागृहांच्या सुविधांचा अभाव जाणवत असून, दीर्घ प्रतीक्षेमुळे प्रवाशांचे हाल होत आहेत. आपत्कालीन परिस्थितीत महामार्ग इतक्या काळासाठी बंद राहतो, याबाबत वाहनचालकांनी नाराजी व्यक्त केली आहे. दरम्यान, परिस्थिती नियंत्रणात आणण्यासाठी आपत्कालीन यंत्रणा, पोलीस आणि महामार्ग प्रशासन युद्धपातळीवर प्रयत्न करत आहेत. सुरक्षिततेचा पूर्ण आढावा घेतल्यानंतरच महामार्ग पूर्णपणे खुला केला जाईल, अशी माहिती प्रशासनाकडून देण्यात आली आहे. तोपर्यंत प्रवाशांना पर्यायी मार्गांचा वापर करण्याचे आवाहन करण्यात आले आहे. १. ताम्हिणी घाट मार्ग: पुणे → पौड → ताम्हिणी घाट → माणगाव → मुंबई. (दक्षिण मुंबईसाठी उपयुक्त) २. माळशेज घाट मार्ग: पुणे → चाकण → नारायणगाव → माळशेज घाट → कल्याण/ठाणे. (उपनगरांसाठी उपयुक्त) कृपया लोणावळा-खंडाळा मार्ग पूर्णपणे टाळावा. प्रवासाचा वेळ ३-५ तासांनी वाढू शकतो, त्यामुळे पुरेसे इंधन आणि पाणी सोबत ठेवावे.

title: Clubes da Libra recebem duas ofertas por fatia de direitos de TV da Série A
content: Clubes da Libra receberam propostas de compra de partes de direitos de TV do Brasileiro, do banco Daycoval e da empresa Sportsmedia (investidora da Futebol Forte União - antiga LFU). As ofertas têm modelos bem diferentes, sendo uma para só compra de direitos (Daycoval) e a outra de compromisso de participar da negociação coletiva dentro de uma liga. Entre os clubes da Libra estão Palmeiras, São Paulo, Santos, Bahia, Red Bull Bragantino, Grêmio, Remo, Atlético-MG, Vitória e Flamengo. O Flamengo não foi procurado por nenhum dos dois e sempre se recusou a vender. O Palmeiras também ainda não recebeu propostas e é resistente à venda. Já Galo e o rubro-negro baiano já têm acordos futuros firmados com a FFU para seus direitos. A proposta do Daycoval é de compra de 5% dos direitos do Brasileiro por 15 anos. A informação foi publicada primeiro no Estadão e confirmada pelo blog. Cada clube recebeu um valuation diferente por seus ativos. Não há previsão de participação pelo banco das negociações dos direitos - o Daycoval se concentra em operações de crédito no futebol. Foi possível saber que o oferecido ao Grêmio está na casa de R$ 70 milhões. Outros clubes como São Paulo e Santos também receberam propostas do Daycoval em valroes não foram revelados. Os são-paulinos já tiveram reuniões com o banco. A proposta da Sportsmedia - grupo de investidores que inclui a GA, LCP e XP - também é no mesmo modelo dos clubes já associados à FFU. Ou seja, é uma oferta de compra de 10% dos direitos por 50 anos. Assessorados pelo BTG, os investidores têm como objetivo final a construção de uma liga que inclua todos os direitos coletivos dos clubes da Sërie A e B. Por isso, o acordo pressupõe que o grupo seja o negociador dos direitos do Brasileiro. Pela informação do blog, os clubes ainda estão analisando a proposta do Daycoval e da Sportsmedia. Clubes com mais necessidade financeira como Santos, São Paulo e Grêmio têm maior propensão a aceitar. O Palmeiras entende que, se for procurado, vai recusar. No entendimento do grupo de investidores da FFU, não há uma concorrência entre as propostas porque o modelo do Dayvocal seria de crédito antecipado, diferente do seu projeto de liga. Porém, os clubes devem considerar só uma das duas ofertas ou haveria um comprometimento maior dos seus percentuais de direitos do Brasileiro.
creator: rodrigo mattos

title: 하바노스, 중국 춘절 기념 독점 비톨라 '트리니다드 코르셀' 출시
content: 아바나 , 2026년 2월 4일 /PRNewswire/ -- 하바노스(Habanos, S.A.)가 중국 음력 설 '춘절'을 기념해 트리니다드(Trinidad) 브랜드 최초의 특별 한정판 제품인 코르셀(Corcel) 비톨라를 새롭게 선보였다. 코르셀은 고대 전통에서 말이 상징하는 힘과 불굴의 정신에서 영감을 받아 제작됐다. 트리니다드는 혁신성과 진정성을 상징하는 브랜드로, 이 이름에는 세계문화유산으로 지정된 매력적인 쿠바 도시 트리니다드에 대한 헌사가 담겨있다. 이러한 탁월함의 유산은 세세한 부분까지 전통과 품격을 반영하면서 모든 비톨라에 영감을 준다. 트리니다드 코르셀의 글로벌 론칭 행사는 1월 29일 홍콩 호프웰 호텔(Hopewell Hotel) 내 에메랄드 & 펄 파빌리온(Emerald & Pearl Pavilion) 에서 열렸다. 이곳은 하바노 애호가들이 모여 활발히 교류하는 대표적인 거점이다. 하바노스의 공식 유통사인 퍼시픽 시가 코퍼레이션 ( Pacific Cigar Corporation )이 주최한 이 행사에는 전 세계 180여 명 의 애호가들이 모여, 비톨라의 글로벌 시장 확대를 알리는 출발점이 됐다. 트리니다드 코르셀(링 게이지 55 x 길이 135mm) 은 중간 강도의 균형 잡힌 기분 좋은 흡연 경험을 선사한다. 연소 과정에서는 균일한 불꽃 고리와 함께 밝은 회색부터 중간 회색 톤에 이르는 촘촘하고 고른 재를 형성한다. 넉넉한 게이지와 절제된 강도는 세련되고 평온한 흡연 경험을 제공하며, 트리니다드가 지향하는 절제된 고급스러움과 완벽한 장인 정신 이라는 명성을 고스란히 보여준다. 트리니다드 코르셀 은 개별 번호가 부여된 우아한 케이스에 18개의 하바노가 담겨 제공되며, 케이스에는 NFC 기술이 적용돼 상세한 제품 정보와 진품 인증을 제공함으로써 안목 있는 수집가들의 기대를 충족시킨다. 홍콩에서 열린 전통과 혁신을 기념하는 잊지 못할 출시 행사 공식 론칭은 2026년 1월 29일 춘절 축하 행사의 일환으로 열린 독점 저녁 행사에서 진행됐다. 참석자들은 번영, 조화, 갱신의 길조로운 분위기를 조성한 강렬한 중국 북과 전통 악기 공연으로 시작된 몰입감 넘치는 문화 체험을 즐겼다. 이날의 하이라이트는 전통과 현대적 요소가 어우러진 얼후 (Erhu) 와 구정 (Guzheng) 의 음악 공연이었다. 이 공연은 행사장의 축제 분위기를 고조시키면서 트리니다드 코르셀 출시의 세련된 이미지를 완벽하게 살렸다. 다그 홀름보 ( Dag Holmboe ) 퍼시픽 시가 코퍼레이션의 CEO는 혁신을 수용하면서도 전통을 보존하는 것의 중요성을 강조하며 트리니다드 코르셀의 출시와 선별된 글로벌...
creator: itbiznews

title: Tras incendios en Argentina, un israelí condenado por hacer fuego en Chile
कार्यकर्त्यांच्या भावना लक्षात घेऊन राष्ट्रीय अध्यक्ष निवडू
content: मुंबई : "राष्ट्रवादी काँग्रेसवर ओढवलेल्या कठीण काळात पक्षाची घडी बसवण्यासाठी उपमुख्यमंत्री सुनेत्रा पवार यांच्या नेतृत्वाखाली संघटन मजबूत करण्याचा निर्धार पक्षाने केला आहे. विधिमंडळ पक्षनेत्याची निवड आवश्यक होती आणि ती पूर्ण करण्यात आली आहे. राष्ट्रीय अध्यक्षपदाबाबत निर्णय घेताना कार्यकर्ते, आमदार आणि जनतेच्या भावना लक्षात घेऊन योग्य वेळी निर्णय घेतला जाईल", अशी भूमिका राष्ट्रवादी काँग्रेसचे प्रदेशाध्यक्ष सुनील तटकरे यांनी बुधवारी स्पष्ट केली. माध्यमांशी बोलताना तटकरे म्हणाले की, सुनेत्रा पवार यांच्या नेतृत्वाखाली राष्ट्रवादी काँग्रेसचे भवितव्य मजबूत करण्यासाठी सामूहिक नेतृत्वाच्या माध्यमातून प्रयत्न सुरू आहेत. अजित पवार यांनी घेतलेले निर्णय हे वैयक्तिक नव्हते, तर पक्षाच्या सामूहिक भूमिकेतून घेतलेले होते. हीच परंपरा पुढेही कायम ठेवली जाईल. सध्या विधिमंडळ पक्षनेत्याची जागा भरणे अधिक महत्त्वाचे होते. उर्वरित निर्णय कार्यकर्त्यांच्या भावना लक्षात घेऊन योग्य वेळी घेतले जातील. अजित पवारांच्या राजकीय भूमिकेवर बोलताना तटकरे म्हणाले की, २०१९ मध्ये अजित पवारांची इच्छा होती की भाजप आणि राष्ट्रवादीचे सरकार व्हावे. त्यावेळी त्यांच्या इच्छेकडे कोणी लक्ष दिले नाही. त्यामुळे त्यांना कठोर निर्णय घ्यावे लागले. लोकसभा निवडणुकीत दोन्ही गटांनी एकमेकांविरोधात लढत दिली, याची आकडेवारी सर्वांसमोर आहे. जनतेने एनडीएसोबत जाण्याच्या निर्णयाला मोठा कौल दिला, असेही त्यांनी नमूद केले. विलीनीकरणाच्या चर्चांवर तटकरे यांनी स्पष्ट भूमिका मांडली. राष्ट्रवादी काँग्रेस हा एनडीएचा घटक पक्ष असून भाजपचा मित्रपक्ष आहे. सरकारमध्ये सहभाग, लोकसभा निवडणूक आणि सध्याची सत्तेतली भागीदारी पाहता विलीनीकरणाबाबत कोणतीही ठोस चर्चा झालेली नाही. विलीनीकरण कोणत्या पक्षात आणि कसे होणार, याबाबत कुणीही स्पष्ट बोलत नसल्याचे त्यांनी सांगितले. विधिमंडळ पक्षनेतेपदी सुनेत्रा पवार यांची निवड जनतेच्या आणि आमदारांच्या भावनांचा आदर राखून करण्यात आली आहे. या निर्णयावर शंका उपस्थित करणे योग्य नाही, असे तटकरे यांनी ठामपणे सांगितले. अजित पवार यांनी गेल्या काही वर्षांत निर्माण केलेला जनसंपर्क आणि संघटन बळाच्या जोरावरच पक्षाला मोठा पाठिंबा मिळाल्याचा त्यांनी उल्लेख केला. अजित पवार यांनी पक्षाला ज्या उंचीवर नेऊन ठेवले, ती परंपरा पुढे नेण्याचे आव्हान आता सुनेत्रा पवार आणि उर्वरित नेतृत्वासमोर आहे. विधिमंडळ पक्षनेत्या म्हणून त्यांची भूमिका महत्त्वाची ठरणार असून, आगामी काळात आमदार आणि कार्यकर्त्यांच्या भावना लक्षात घेऊनच पक्ष अधिक मजबूत केला जाईल, असा विश्वास सुनील तटकरे यांनी व्यक्त केला.

title: Rus se svlékl a vyskočil z letadla
Ukraine blasts FIFA for suggesting Russia’s return
content: Tensions have flared after FIFA president Gianni Infantino suggested Russia’s possible return to international football competitions. Ukrainian officials say such a move would undermine sporting integrity and ignore the realities of the four-year conflict. Russian footballers have been banned from competing in FIFA and UEFA tournaments since Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. “He says that the ban should now be lifted,” says UK correspondent Adam Gilchrist. ALSO READ: Blatter calls for US World Cup boycott, but critics say FIFA’s moral compass is broken Infantino said the ban had 'not achieved anything' and had created 'more frustration and hatred'. Ukraine’s sports minister, Matvii Bidnyi, has hit back, calling Infantino 'irresponsible' and 'infantile'. “Mr Bidnyi says an attempt to detach football from reality is just not on, especially when that reality means children are being killed and Ukrainian footballers and coaches are dying. He says around 100 footballers alone have died in the four years since Russia started its attack on Ukraine,” says Gilchrist. Symbolism is sometimes lost on the boss of FIFA, Gilchrist quips. Infantino recently presented US President Donald Trump with the inaugural ‘FIFA Peace Prize’. “He himself received Russia’s Order of Friendship medal, so what on earth is all this about?” wonders Gilchrist. To listen to Gilchrist in conversation with 702's Bongani Bingwa, use the audio player below:

title: Uruguay y China, la clave es la estrategia. Esteban Valenti
content: 04.02.2026 Estamos en medio de la visita de la delegación uruguaya más numerosa (150 personas entre funcionarios estatales, empresarios y representantes sociales) encabezados por el presidente de la República, Yamandú Orsi. Ya se produjo el encuentro con el líder de China Xi Jinping y la firma de once acuerdos entre ambos países y también ya trascendió (espontáneamente...) la noticia del seguimiento de parte de los Estados Unidos de esta visita y más en general de las relaciones de nuestro país con China. Esta información hay que interpretarla en el marco de la actual política norteamericana en América Latina y en su prioridad de frenar a China en todos los terrenos, pero en especial en la amistad y la cooperación con los países de la región. Los ejemplos sobran. Hay un celo estratégico y agresivo como nunca antes, por parte de los Estados Unidos, América Latina es hoy considerado una zona cerrada de influencia norteamericana y ver a China entrar tan fuerte (comprando carne, soja, madera y queriendo construir infraestructuras) les genera mucha inseguridad. Estados Unidos ve a Uruguay como un socio democrático ejemplar en la región (una "joya" de estabilidad). No quieren que esa joya dependa demasiado de Pekín. No es tanto que Uruguay le venda carne a China (eso lo entienden, son negocios), sino la influencia política y tecnológica china que viene detrás del dinero. Hay tres cosas que a los estadounidenses les ponen los pelos de punta en la relación de Uruguay con China. A EE.UU. le preocupa mucho la presencia de flotas pesqueras chinas y la posibilidad de que China invierta en infraestructura portuaria estratégica en el Atlántico Sur. Lo ven como un riesgo de seguridad. Estados Unidos presiona mucho para que Uruguay no use tecnología china 5G (como Huawei) en sus redes de comunicaciones. Argumentan que China podría usar esa tecnología para espionaje. Washington prefiere que Uruguay use tecnología occidental, aunque sea más cara. Cualquier cooperación en temas espaciales o de defensa con China enciende todas las alarmas en el Comando Sur de los EE.UU. Uruguay ha jugado sus cartas con mucha inteligencia y con el expreso reconocimiento de Orsi, es la continuidad de una política de Estado, este gobierno de izquierda ha mostrado impulsos y movimientos mucho más efectivos. Y sobre todo resultados en el primer año de gobierno. Estados Unidos trata de contrarrestar a China ofreciendo alianzas de "calidad", inversiones en...

title: Oxford English Dictionary adds South African, Nigerian, Ghanaian words
content: The Oxford English Dictionary has expanded its lexicon with more than 20 new words from South Africa, Nigeria, and Ghana in its latest update for the 2020s. The additions include food terms, slang and culturally specific expressions that reflect how English continues to evolve across the African continent. Food, fraud and everyday slang Among the Nigerian and West African entries is ewa , a staple food made from cassava, as well as 419 , a reference to fraud under the Nigerian criminal code. Other new inclusions range from words describing popular street food packaging to terms rooted in music and everyday life. “There’s a lot of food,” noted The Africa Report’s Crystal Orderson, highlighting how culinary culture features prominently in the new additions. The update also includes words tied to music genres such as highlife and familiar South African expressions like yoh and sharp-sharp . Language that moves with culture A Nigerian language expert involved in suggesting entries told interviewers that English is constantly shifting and must accommodate how Africans speak. “English is changing, and how Africans speak needs to be accommodated,” he said. He added that the global dictionary must reflect lived realities. “If you sit in Malaysia or anywhere in the world, you must be able to look up this word and say, ‘Yoh, that’s interesting.’” The move underscores English’s adaptability, with commentators noting that its dynamism is part of why it remains widely embraced. Survival through evolution The discussion also touched on Afrikaans, with speakers reflecting on its ability to evolve and absorb influences over time.

“La fiscalización es clave para que las amnistías no se vuelvan costumbre”, advierte Obed García
content: El Congreso Nacional de Honduras aprobó el martes un decreto que concede amnistías en sectores clave como el municipal, energético, vehicular, telecomunicaciones y migratorio.La iniciativa, presentada con dispensa de debates por el diputado Milton Puerto Oseguera, obtuvo mayoría absoluta en una sesión caracterizada por la rapidez en su trámite.Por su parte, el economista Obed García advirtió que las recientes amnistías aprobadas por el Congreso Nacional de Honduras deben acompañarse de medidas de control y fiscalización para que no se conviertan en una práctica recurrente.Señaló que el objetivo es que los contribuyentes desarrollen una cultura de cumplimiento y no esperen nuevos perdones fiscales cada pocos años.Lea también: Congreso Nacional aprueba amplio paquete de amnistías en Honduras ¿A quiénes beneficia?¿Cuáles son las medidas que se deben implementar?García subrayó la fiscalización como eje central, que instituciones como el Servicio de Administración de Rentas (SAR) y la Empresa Nacional de Energía Eléctrica (ENEE) necesitan retomar las inspecciones que en años anteriores se dejaron de realizar.“La fiscalización es clave para que los usuarios de servicios públicos y los contribuyentes cumplan con sus obligaciones sin esperar un salvavidas en forma de amnistía”, afirmó.El decreto aprobado por el Congreso, presentado por el diputado Milton Puerto Oseguera, concede amnistías en sectores como el municipal, energético, vehicular, telecomunicaciones y migratorio.La medida permite que ciudadanos y empresas regularicen pagos sin cubrir multas acumuladas, lo que representa un alivio inmediato para pequeños negocios y personas con deudas tributarias.Sin embargo, García insistió en que este beneficio debe ser acompañado de controles efectivos. “No podemos permitir que los contribuyentes se desentiendan de sus pagos esperando futuros perdones fiscales”, puntualizó.El economista destacó que la amnistía energética, que exonera por dos meses multas e intereses, debe servir como incentivo para que los usuarios honren sus obligaciones.“La cultura del ciudadano hondureño tiene que ser proactiva, sobre todo para cumplir con los tributos y los servicios públicos”, expresó.La aprobación del decreto representa un alivio inmediato, pero también plantea el reto de consolidar una cultura tributaria que fortalezca la economía hondureña sin depender de medidas excepcionales.Lea también: Entran en vigor las amnistías...

title: Boks to kick off 2027 RWC title defence against Italy
content: The Springboks will return to Adelaide when they kick off their 2027 Rugby World Cup campaign against Italy on 3 October 2027. World Rugby announced the 2027 Rugby World Cup schedule on Tuesday, which will be played in eight venues across Australia. The new format with 24 teams will see a round of 16 playing out on the weekend of 23 and 24 October, with the quarterfinals set for 30 to 31 October. The semifinals are set for 5 and 6 November, and the final will take place on 13 November. South Africa will face Italy, Georgia, and Romania in Pool B, as they hope to win their third consecutive title. Sports reporter Craig Ray said that, while the group stage seems straightforward, the real challenge will come in the knockout stage, which could potentially see a fixture against New Zealand. He said the Springboks are a well-equipped, strong team with good depth, with coach Rassie Erasmus focusing on winning the upcoming three tests against the All Blacks. “There are some little issues, but generally speaking, 20-odd months out from the World Cup, the Springboks are in great shape, and it’s going to come down to three games for them; quarter-final, semifinal and final.” Ray criticised the tournament’s new format, suggesting that the increased number of teams and seeding of the teams was an ‘own goal’ by World Rugby. “While rugby did not have a lot of jeopardy in the pool games to start with, they are pretty predictable. In 2027, it is going to be even worse because you really don’t have any big games. “What’s the point of seedings if you are not going to separate your first and second seeds at the time of a draw? They are now going to meet in the quarterfinals." To listen to Ray in conversation with CapeTalk’s John Maytham , use the audio player below:

Como o Vitória virou rival indigesto para o Palmeiras nos últimos dois anos
content: Palmeiras e Vitória se enfrentam hoje, às 21h30 (de Brasília), na Arena Barueri, pela 2a rodada do Brasileirão . O campeonato acabou de começar, mas o Alviverde sabe que não pode tropeçar contra o rubro-negro baiano se quiser reconquistar o Campeonato Brasileiro. Vitória atrapalhou o Palmeiras no Brasileirão nos últimos dois anos Em julho de 2024, o Palmeiras recebeu o Vitória no Allianz Parque pelo segundo turno do Brasileirão e tentava perseguir o líder Botafogo. Abel Ferreira poupou titulares de olho no duelo de ida contra o Flamengo, pelas oitavas de final da Copa do Brasil, e o Alviverde perdeu por 2 a 0. O cenário se tornou ainda pior para o Palmeiras após o jogo contra o Vitória. Apesar de poupar titulares, Abel escalou Estêvão como titular (que se recuperava de lesão), e o garoto sentiu uma nova lesão no tornozelo. Estêvão ficou fora dos dois jogos contra o Flamengo, e o Palmeiras acabou eliminado na Copa do Brasil. Além disso, Estêvão não ficou 100% para os duelos contra o Botafogo, pelas oitavas de final da Copa Libertadores, duas semanas depois. O atacante jogou apenas 33 minutos do primeiro jogo, em que o Palmeiras perdeu por 2 a 1, e, apesar de ter jogado toda a volta, a equipe de Abel Ferreira empatou por 2 a 2 e também caiu na Copa Libertadores. O Vitória voltou a ser problema para o Palmeiras no Brasileirão de 2025. No primeiro turno do ano passado, Abel escalou reservas em Salvador por que o jogo antecedia o duelo decisivo contra o Corinthians pelas oitavas de final da Copa do Brasil, o Alviverde saiu perdendo por 2 a 0, mas buscou o empate. No segundo turno, em novembro do ano passado, o Palmeiras recebeu o Vitória no Allianz Parque com seis rodadas para o fim do campeonato após duas derrotas seguidas (Mirassol e Santos). O Alviverde fez um jogo muito ruim, empatou por 0 a 0, e perdeu a chance de tirar vantagem do Flamengo na liderança (que perdeu naquela rodada para o Flu). Depois do empate em casa contra o Vitória, o Palmeiras empatou com o Fluminense, perdeu para o Grêmio e deu adeus ao título do Brasileirão. Após escalar um time titular todo reserva contra o Botafogo-SP (com exceção de Vitor Roque), Abel Ferreira vai escalar força máxima contra o Vitória para a equipe não repetir o mesmo erro dos últimos anos.

title: Vorwurf Brandstiftung: Kegelbrüder erhalten Großteil der Kaution zurück
content: Mehr als 368.000 Euro bekommen die angeklagten Kegelbrüder zurück – doch die Staatsanwaltschaft fordert weiter sieben Jahre Haft. Was steckt hinter dem überraschenden Gerichtsbeschluss?Die wegen Brandstiftung auf Mallorca angeklagten Hobbykegler aus dem Münsterland erhalten einen Großteil der für ihre Freilassung hinterlegten Kaution zurück. Einen entsprechenden Medienbericht bestätigte eine Justizsprecherin auf Anfrage. Die acht Angeklagten hatten 2022 insgesamt 500.000 Euro hinterlegen müssen, um nach rund zwei Monaten aus der Untersuchungshaft freizukommen. Das Landgericht ordnete in dem Beschluss an, dass die Kaution auf 131.430,60 Euro gesenkt werde. Somit müssten die Deutschen mehr als 368.000 Euro zurückbekommen. Die sogenannten Kegelbrüder haben von Anfang an jede Schuld an dem Brand zurückgewiesen. Was sagt die Strafverteidigerin?Als Grund für die Neuberechnung habe das Gericht angeführt, Gutachten seien zwischenzeitlich zu einer wesentlich geringeren Schadenshöhe gekommen, als zunächst unmittelbar nach dem Brand vor fast vier Jahren angenommen worden sei. "Es ist ein großer Erfolg", sagte die spanische Strafverteidigerin der Deutschen, Maria Barbancho, wie Inselmedien berichteten. An der Anklage ändert sich allerdings nichts. Nach dem Willen der spanischen Staatsanwaltschaft sollen sie wegen vorsätzlicher Brandstiftung für sieben Jahre ins Gefängnis. Zudem sollen sie zusammen Schadenersatz in Höhe von 100.000 Euro zahlen. Die jungen Männer haben von Anfang an bestritten, für den Brand am 20. Mai 2022 in einer Kneipe am Ballermann verantwortlich zu sein. Wann der Prozess beginnen könnte, ist noch nicht bekannt.

Camarões mortos são encontrados às margens do rio Tietê no interior de SP
content: Centenas de camarões de água doce foram encontrados mortos às margens do rio Tietê no interior de São Paulo . Eles começaram a aparecer na segunda-feira (2) em uma prainha de Igaraçu do Tietê, a 289 km da capital paulista . Segundo a Secretaria de Meio Ambiente da cidade, a Cetesb (Companhia Ambiental do Estado de São Paulo) foi informada sobre o ocorrido e chamada para vistoriar o local. Técnicos do órgão ambiental coletaram amostras de água e dos espécimes afetados para analisar a mortandade. Em nota, a Prefeitura de Igaraçu do Tietê afirmou que o fenômeno pode ter sido causado pela redução do oxigênio dissolvido na água do rio. "Esta é uma situação complexa, que costuma envolver uma combinação de diversos fatores, incluindo variações climáticas, questões ambientais e intervenções humanas", diz o comunicado. A Secretaria do Meio Ambiente faz uma apuração para descobrir as causas da mortandade e tomar providências. "A Prefeitura de Igaraçu do Tietê reafirma o seu compromisso com a preservação dos recursos hídricos e continuará monitorando a área, mantendo a população informada sobre os desdobramentos do caso", completa a nota oficial. Com 23 mil moradores, a cidade é uma estância turística desde 1994 e a prainha onde os camarões apareceram mortos é uma das áreas de lazer do local.

title: Confusion over legal representation takes centre stage in Wynberg court shooting case
content: Confusion over legal representation has taken centre stage in the Wynberg Magistrates Court shooting case. Four of the five accused linked to a fatal shooting inside the court building in April 2025 are still without lawyers. Shireen Matthews, Abubaker Adams, Brian Booysen, Wanay Farao and Vuyisani Zengethwa appeared in court on Wednesday. Proceedings focused on which court will hear the case. ALSO READ: The court heard that Adams, Booysen, Farao and Zengethwa still have no legal representation. Legal Aid earlier said it would not represent the accused, and a Judicare lawyer was meant to be appointed. The four accused told the court that a woman claiming to be a lawyer visited them in prison, in December. But they were unable to provide the court with her details, and she was not present in court. State prosecutor Advocate Christiaan de Jongh has assured the court he will investigate the matter.

UK will release files related to Mandelson's ambassador appointment in more Epstein fallout
content: LONDON (AP) — The British government agreed Wednesday to release emails and other documents casting light on the decision to appoint Peter Mandelson as ambassador to the United States despite his friendship with Jeffrey Epstein . The move came after the opposition Conservative Party said it would force a vote in Parliament calling for the release of emails and other messages related to Mandelson’s appointment in 2024. Critics say he should never have been given the job because his relationship with Epstein — though not its extent — was known at the time.

title: Gabon : vers la digitalisation des permis de conduire
content: L’annonce a été faite par le ministère des Transports, de la Marine marchande et de la Logistique. LA SUITE APRÈS LA PUBLICITÉ L’objectif est de moderniser la gestion des permis de conduire, à mettre fin aux lourdeurs administratives, à lutter contre la fraude et les falsifications, et à garantir une sécurisation durable des données des conducteurs sur l’ensemble du territoire national. vise à moderniser la gestion des permis de conduire, à mettre fin aux lourdeurs administratives, à lutter contre la fraude et les falsifications, et à garantir une sécurisation durable des données des conducteurs sur l’ensemble du territoire national. Et sera une solution durable notamment par des démarches simplifiées, données fiables, meilleure interopérabilité entre services de l’État et fin des blocages liés au support physique. Pour l’heure, la date officielle du lancement de digitalisation de permis de contenus n’a pas encore été déterminée.

title: Diyarbakır'da bir öğrencinin duygulandıran bayrak hassasiyeti!
content: Diyarbakır’da bir okulda koridorda katlanmış olarak asılan bayrağı gören öğrenci, o bayrağı düzelterek olması gerektiği hale getirdi. O anlarda okulun güvenlik kamerası da kayıttaydı. Diyarbakır’ın Sur ilçesindeki bir ortaokulda, öğretmenler farkındalık yaratmak amacıyla Türk bayrağını buruşuk şekilde astı ve öğrencilerin vereceği tepkiyi görmek amacıyla güvenlik kameralarının başına geçti. Çalışmanın ilk dakikalarında sınıf defterini almak için koridora çıkan 5’inci sınıf öğrencisi Kübra Temiz, katlanmış haldeki bayrağı fark ederek hemen düzeltti. Temiz’in Türk bayrağıyla alakalı hassasiyeti güvenlik kamerasınca kaydedildi.
creator: cnn türk

title: Israel strikes Gaza, killing 21 including women and children, after saying Hamas violated deal
content: By WAFAA SHURAFA, SAMY MAGDY and JULIA FRANKEL, Associated PressDEIR AL-BALAH, Gaza Strip (AP) — Israeli strikes pounded Gaza on Wednesday, killing at least 21 Palestinians, including two infants, and further rocking a fragile ceasefire deal, hospital officials said. Israel said it was responding to a militant attack on Israeli soldiers that seriously wounded one.Deadly Israeli strikes have repeatedly punctuated the truce since it came into effect on Oct. 10, and the escalating Palestinian toll has made many in Gaza say it feels like the war is continuing unabated. Among the Palestinians killed Wednesday were five children, seven women and an on-duty paramedic, according to hospital officials.“The genocidal war against our people in the Gaza Strip continues,” said Dr. Mohamed Abu Selmiya, director of Gaza City’s Shifa Hospital, in a Facebook post. “Where is the ceasefire? Where are the mediators?”Israel strongly denies accusations that it is committing genocide in Gaza. The war began on Oct. 7, 2023, when thousands of Hamas terrorists poured into southern Israel after a surprise barrage of rockets, killing 1,200 people, most of them civilians, and abducting 251.Hamas has been designated as a terrorist organization by the United States, Canada and the European Union.Deadly strikes have continued despite ceasefire dealThe deal attempted to halt the more than 2-year-old war between Israel and Hamas. While the heaviest fighting has subsided, it has been marred by repeated flareups of violence.Related ArticlesRussia and Ukraine envoys meet in Abu Dhabi for US-brokered talksChina to ban hidden door handles on cars starting 2027US announces military team sent to Nigeria after recent attacksWomen returning to Gaza say Israeli troops bound and interrogated them after Rafah crossingOlympic officials from Africa quiz 2028 Los Angeles Summer Games leaders on visa concernsA total of 556 Palestinians have been killed by Israel and 1,500 wounded since the ceasefire went into effect, according to Gaza health officials, while Israel’s military says four Israeli soldiers have been killed.Israel’s military has said its continuing strikes are responses to Hamas violations or attacks on its soldiers, but dozens of civilians have died. Eight Arab and Muslim countries, including mediators Egypt and Qatar, recently condemned what they called Israel’s “repeated violations” of the deal.An Israeli military official, speaking on the condition of anonymity in line with military...

Roger Craig may beat fellow 49ers great Frank Gore to Hall of Fame
content: SAN FRANCISCO – Joe Montana threw around his certified clout in summing up Roger Craig’s influence on the 49ers’ Team of the ’80s.“He meant everything to that offense,” Montana said.Craig and Frank Gore, two of the greatest running backs to wear the 49ers uniform, are finalists to slip on a Pro Football Hall of Fame gold jacket this summer.This year’s class will be revealed Thursday night at NFL Honors, even though it was selected Jan. 13 by the 50-member voting committee.Craig’s 32-year wait is increasingly expected to end. A Seniors finalist, he seemingly should emerge after ESPN reported first-ballot snubs of Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft, the former New England Patriots power duo who were coach and owner finalists in the same voting quadrant.For Gore, he also could be overlooked as a first-ballot finalist, even though the NFL’s third all-time leading rusher will inevitably be invited to Canton.Craig, 65, advanced in 2010 and 2020 as a modern-era finalist. He has maintained a low profile in recent years, and although he joined former 49ers greats for a San Francisco dinner last week, he steered clear of joining them at last Tuesday’s “Rise of the 49ers” premiere in the Mission district.“It’s so overdue,” Montana said last week of Craig’s Hall of Fame case. “There’s another guy in there that has done what he’s done and there’s no reason he shouldn’t be there. Hopefully they give him his due respect and he gets in. We’re all pulling for him.”Craig was an NFL pioneer as the first player to produce 1,000 yards both rushing and receiving in a season, in 1985. Only 2011 Hall of Fame inductee Marshall Faulk (1999 Rams) and Christian McCaffrey (2019 Panthers) have matched that feat, and McCaffrey nearly did so again this season on the 49ers (1,202 rushing yards, 924 receiving).“There’s a guy that wasn’t just a runner,” Montana added of Craig. “He’s like a wide receiver catching passes out of the backfield. Today, they’d even split him out and let him run routes out there. That’s the kind of player he is.”As Montana gathered last week with fellow stars from the 49ers’ 1980s dynasty for a screening of AMC’s “Rise of the 49ers” docuseries, several others sang Craig’s praises, as they had done at a dinner with him the previous night.“I remember the first time I came to the Niners, he took me to ‘The Hill.’ It hurt me,” Jerry Rice said of a training run on the Peninsula. “I actually stayed away for a couple of days, then I said I have to go back and conquer that...

The orthotic-friendly insert provides a comfortable step all day, and the pull tab provides an easy way to slip them on and off. They would also make great house slippers for houses with slippery or cold floors. This shoe is available in normal and wide widths, from size five through size 12. title: Paris’ten gelen gazeteci ve influencerlar, Kayseri’yi tanıttı
content: Paris’ten gelen gazeteci ve influencerlar, Kayseri’yi tanıttı KAYSERİ, (DHA)- PARİS Büyükelçiliği Kültür ve Tanıtma Müşavirliği öncülüğünde Kayseri’ye gelen gazeteci ve influencerlardan oluşan heyet, Erciyes Kayak Merkezi’nde kayak yaptı, Kayseri yağlamasını Mutfak Sanatları Merkezi’nde düzenlenen workshop ile deneyimledi. Türkiye’nin Paris Büyükelçiliği Kültür ve Tanıtma Müşaviri Fatma Özsoy öncülüğünde Kayseri’ye gelen heyette; gazeteciler Gegout Salome Algıabonı, Talık Lolaw Ladıslawalucıe ile sosyal medyada geniş kitlelere hitap eden influencerlar Hoet Indıana, Rıchter Epgryffon Jenny Stephanı Emyrıamfrıda, Raffestın Solene, Mussler Chloe Emarıne Cyrıl, Jalou Valentıne Laurence Florence ve Ifı Lısacecılec yer aldı. Heyet, ‘Dünyanın En İyi Kayak Merkezleri’ listesinde yer alan Erciyes Kayak Merkezi’nde kayak yaparak bol bol fotoğraf ve video çekimleri gerçekleştirdi. 112 kilometrelik 41 kayak pisti ve 19 mekanik tesisiyle Türkiye’nin en donanımlı kayak merkezlerinden biri olan Erciyes, katılımcılardan tam not aldı. Uluslararası misafirler, Erciyes’in hem sportif altyapısından hem de doğal güzelliklerinden duydukları hayranlığı dile getirdi. Program kapsamında kentin gastronomi değerlerine de özel önem verildi. Parisli gazeteci ve influencerlar, Kayseri mutfağının gelişimi ve tanıtımı amacıyla Kayseri Mutfak Sanatları Merkezi’nde düzenlenen Kayseri Yağlaması workshopuna katıldı. Öte yandan, Ev Sahibi Türkiye – Yüzyılın Konut Projesi 500 Bin Sosyal Konut Kampanyası Kayseri İli Kura Çekiliş Töreni için kente gelen Çevre, Şehircilik ve İklim Değişikliği Bakan Yardımcısı Burak Demiralp ile Kayseri Büyükşehir Belediye Başkanı Memduh Büyükkılıç, Mutfak Sanatları Merkezi’nde Paris Büyükelçiliği Kültür ve Tanıtma Müşavirliği heyetiyle bir araya geldi. Sıcak ve samimi bir ortamda gerçekleşen buluşmada, Kayseri’nin tarihi, kültürel ve turistik değerleri üzerine sohbet edildi. Bakan Yardımcısı Burak Demiralp, şehirlerin tarihini, kültürünü ve mutfağını tanıtmanın önemine dikkat çekerek, Kayseri’nin bu alandaki çalışmalarından dolayı Başkan Memduh Büyükkılıç’a teşekkür etti. (DHA) FOTOĞRAFLI
creator: cnn türk

title: İzmir'de ramazan ayı öncesi denetimler sürüyor
content: İzmir'de ramazan ayı öncesi denetimler sürüyor İZMİR'de Ticaret Bakanlığı ve Tarım ve Orman Bakanlığı ekipleri, ramazan ayı öncesinde başta temel gıda ürünleri olmak üzere piyasada oluşabilecek fahiş fiyat artışı, stokçuluk, fiyat etiketi konusunda vatandaşların mağduriyet yaşamaması için denetimlerini sürdürüyor. Ticaret Bakanlığı ve Tarım ve Orman Bakanlığı ekipleri, ramazan ayı öncesinde başta temel gıda ürünleri olmak üzere piyasada oluşabilecek fahiş fiyat artışı, stokçuluk, fiyat etiketi konusunda vatandaşların mağduriyet yaşamaması için 81 ilde eş zamanlı olarak marketlerde denetimlerini sürdürüyor. Bu kapsamda İzmir'de gerçekleştirilen denetimlerde; marketlerde bulunan ürünlerin fiyat etiketleri, muhafaza koşulları, son tüketim tarihleri kontrol edildi. Denetim sonrasında yapılan yazılı açıklamada, "Ticaret Bakanlığı olarak Tarım ve Orman Bakanlığı ile koordineli bir şekilde Tarım İl Müdürlükleri ve Ticaret İl Müdürlükleri aracılığıyla ülkemizin her köşesinde ramazan ayı öncesinde ve süresince vatandaşlarımızın refah ve huzuru için başta temel tüketim ürünleri olmak üzere denetimlerimiz hassasiyetle devam edecektir. Çalışmalarımız neticesinde vatandaşlarımızın menfaatlerine ve ticari hayatta ticari etiğe aykırı hareketlerin tespit edilmesi durumunda Ticaret Bakanlığı olarak gerekli yaptırımlar ivedilikle uygulanacak olup, gerekli görüldüğü takdirde yeni uygulamaların da hayata geçirilmesi noktasında hiçbir şekilde taviz verilmeyecektir" denildi.(DHA) Haber: Seza Nur ALPDÜNDAR - Kamera: Tekin GÜRBULAK / İZMİR,(DHA)
creator: cnn türk

title: MMO’da Kılıç adaylığını açıkladı
content: MMO’da Kılıç adaylığını açıkladı Semih ERSÖZLER/ANTALYA, (DHA)- MAKİNA Mühendisleri Odası (MMO) Antalya Şube Başkan Adayı Devrim Kılıç, geçmişte yönetim kurulu ve komisyonlarda görev aldığını belirterek, tecrübesini paylaşmak için yönetim kurulu başkanlığına aday olduğunu açıkladı. MMO Antalya Şube Başkan Adayı Devrim Kılıç, Antalya Gazeteciler Cemiyeti Sosyal Tesisleri’nde gazetecilerle bir araya geldi. Önümüzdeki hafta sonu yapılacak seçimlerle ilgili konuşan Kılıç, seçilmeleri halinde hedeflerini ve vizyonunu paylaştı. Kılıç, 34 yıldır üyesi olduğu MMO’da komisyon ve yönetim kurullarında görev aldığını söyledi. Kılıç, “Edindiğim deneyim, kurumsal sorumluluk bilinci ve mesleki heyecanla, geçmişten gelen birikimi koruyan, değişen koşullara uyum sağlayan, üyeleriyle daha güçlü bağlar kuran ve ortak aklı büyüten bir anlayışla MMO Antalya Şubesi 16. Dönem Şube Başkanlığına adaylığımı meslektaşlarıma ve kamuoyuna saygıyla duyuruyorum. Bu dönemde, tecrübeli üyelerimizin birikimi ile genç mühendis arkadaşlarımızın dinamizmini bir araya getiren, farklı mesleki alanlardan uzmanlıkları buluşturan kapsayıcı bir ekip oluşturdukö dedi. Meslektaşlarıyla ilgili çalışmalara önem vereceklerini belirten Kılıç, “Hedeflerimiz arasında MMO Antalya Şubesi’nin ilişkilerini güçlendirerek, mühendislik mesleğinin kamusal yarar doğrultusunda etkin temsili sürdürmek yer alıyor. Kamusal denetim faaliyetlerinin kapsamı genişletilecek, teknik denetim süreçleri daha etkin ve görünür hale getirip, tasarım, analiz yazılımlarına yönelik eğitim ve etkinliklerle üyelerimizin dijital yetkinlikleri artıracağız. Farklı sektörlere yönelik yılda en az altı teknik gezi düzenlenerek mesleki teorinin saha ile buluşması sağlayacağız. Otel Teknik Eleman Eğitim Merkezi kurup, Ulusal İklimlendirme Kongresi’nin 6’ncısını gerçekleştirileceğiz. Kamu ve özel sektörde çalışan meslektaşlarımızın özlük haklarını koruyacak çalışmalar yürüteceğiz" diye konuştu. Kılıç, MMO’yu ve mesleklerini daha ileriye taşımak için tüm güçleriyle çalışacaklarını söyledi. FOTOĞRAFLI
creator: cnn türk

title: İnegöl 9’uncu Okullar Arası Spor Festivali başladı
content: İnegöl 9’uncu Okullar Arası Spor Festivali başladı Yavuz YILMAZ/İNEGÖL (Bursa), (DHA)-BURSA’da İnegöl Belediyesi’nin Milli Eğitim Müdürlüğü iş birliğinde bu yıl 9’uncusunu gerçekleştirdiği Okullar Arası Spor Festivali basketbol branşı müsabakalarıyla başladı. İnegöl Belediyesi’nin düzenlediği 9’uncu Okullar Arası Spor Festivali 2 Şubat Pazartesi günü basketbol müsabakalarıyla başladı. Akhisar Spor Salonunda start alan turnuvanın ilk 2 gününde 6 müsabaka oynandı. 18 Şubat’a kadar sürecek basketbol branşı müsabakalarının ardından kupa töreni gerçekleştirilecek. Milli Eğitim Müdürlüğü iş birliğinde düzenlenen ve haziran ayına kadar devam edecek spor organizasyonunda 14 farklı branş ve 73 kategoride yaklaşık 500 takım mücadele edecek. Dart, okçuluk, oryantiring, bilek güreşi, güreş, bocce, spor tırmanış, puanlı atletizm, kros, satranç, masa tenisi, akıl oyunları, basketbol ve voleybol branşlarının yer aldığı Okullar Arası Spor Festivalinde, 12-18 yaş arası 3 bin 500 öğrenci müsabakalarda yer alacak.(DHA) FOTOĞRAFLI
creator: cnn türk

title: Eşini bıçaklayarak öldürdü, cesedin başında ağlarken yakalandı
content: Eşini bıçaklayarak öldürdü, cesedin başında ağlarken yakalandı Yusuf YILDIZ-Yaşar SERİNTÜRK/ADANA, (DHA)- ADANA'da kargo işçisi Ş.A., tartıştığı 3 çocuğunun annesi eşi Kadriye Alver’i defalarca bıçaklayarak öldürdü. Olayın ardından cesedin başında ağlayan Ş.A., polis tarafından gözaltına alındı. Olay, sabah saatlerinde, Seyhan ilçesi Meydan Mahallesi’nde meydana geldi. Çocuklarını okula gönderen kargo işçisi Ş.A. ile eşi Kadriye Alver arasında tartışma çıktı. Tartışmanın büyümesi üzerine mutfaktan bıçak alan Ş.A., eşini defalarca bıçakladı. İhbar üzerine adrese sağlık ve polis ekipleri sevk edildi. Sağlık görevlilerinin kontrolünde Alver’in hayatını kaybettiği belirlendi. Polis ekipleri, eşinin başında ağlayan Ş.A.’yı gözaltına aldı. Alver’in cesedi, otopsi için Adana Adli Tıp Kurumu’na kaldırıldı. Ekiplerin olayla ilgili çalışması sürüyor. (DHA) FOTOĞRAFLI
creator: cnn türk

2026 KIŞ OLİMPİYATLARI: 2026 Kış Olimpiyatları Nerede Yapılacak, Ne Zaman? Kış Olimpiyatları Türkiye Sporcu Sayısı Kaç? Google'dan Olimpiyat Doodle'ı!
content: 2026 Kış Olimpiyatları, dünyanın dört bir yanından binlerce sporcunun katılımıyla büyük bir heyecanla başladı. Milano–Cortina atmosferinin hakim olduğu organizasyonda sporcular; curling, alp disiplini, snowboard, kısa kulvar sürat pateni, biatlon, artistik buz pateni ve daha birçok olimpik branşta kıyasıya rekabet ediyor. Açılış töreni öncesinde ilk müsabakalar curling karşılaşmalarıyla start alırken, program boyunca farklı disiplinlerde peş peşe yarışlar düzenleniyor; böylece izleyiciler günler boyunca devam edecek yoğun bir olimpiyat takvimiyle buluşuyor. Peki, 2026 Kış Olimpiyatları nerede yapılacak, ne zaman? Kış Olimpiyatları Türkiye sporcu sayısı kaç? Google'dan olimpiyat doodle'ı! 2026 Kış Olimpiyatları 93 ülkeden 3 bin 500’ü aşkın sporcunun 16 olimpik branş ve 6 paralimpik dalda zorlu bir madalya mücadelesine sahne oluyor; merak edilen “Kış Olimpiyatları nerede yapılacak, Türkiye’den kaç sporcu katılacak ve olimpiyat takvimi nasıl ilerliyor?” sorularının yanıtları ise organizasyon boyunca sporseverlerin gündemindeki yerini koruyor. İşte 2026 Kış Olimpiyatları'na dair detaylar... 2026 KIŞ OLİMPİYATLARI NE ZAMAN BAŞLIYOR? 2026 Kış Olimpiyatları, resmî açılış töreni 6 Şubat 2026 tarihinde Milano’daki San Siro Stadyumu ’nda yapılmak üzere başlayacak; ancak organizasyonda ilk müsabakalar açılıştan önce, 4 Şubat 2026 günü Cortina Olimpiyat Stadı’nda düzenlenen karışık çiftler curling karşılaşmalarıyla fiilen start aldı. Böylece oyunlar, hem açılış seremonisi hem de müsabaka başlangıç tarihi açısından iki aşamalı bir başlangıç süreciyle sporseverlerin karşısına çıkmış oldu. KIŞ OLİMPİYATLARI GOOGLE DOOLE 2026 KIŞ OLİMPİYATLARI NEREDE YAPILACAK? 2026 Kış Olimpiyatları, İtalya’nın Milano ve Cortina d’Ampezzo kentlerinde düzenlenecek olup organizasyonun resmî açılış töreni 6 Şubat 2026 tarihinde Milano’daki San Siro Stadyumu’nda yapılacak; açılıştan önceki ilk müsabakalar ise 4 Şubat 2026’da Cortina Olimpiyat Stadı’nda karışık çiftler curling karşılaşmalarıyla başladı. 2026 KIŞ OLİMPİYATLARI TÜRKİYE SPORCU SAYISI KAÇ? 2026 Kış Olimpiyatları’nda Türkiye’yi temsil edecek sporcu kadrosu bu yıl tarihin en geniş katılımlarından birini oluşturuyor; ülkemiz buz pateni, kayak ve para kayak disiplinlerinde toplam 9 sporcu ile oyunlardaki yerini alarak Milano–Cortina atmosferinde madalya mücadelesine ortak oluyor. मेदिनीपुर: नाबालिग से यौन उत्पीड़न के आरोप में युवक को तीन दिनों की पुलिस हिरासत
content: मेदिनीपुर। नाबालिग से लगातार यौन उत्पीड़न और धमकी देने के आरोप में केशियाड़ी थाना पुलिस ने एक युवक को गिरफ्तार किया है। पीड़िता लंबे समय तक भय के कारण चुप रही, लेकिन हिम्मत जुटाकर न्याय की गुहार लगाते हुए अदालत का दरवाजा खटखटाया। उसके आरोप के आधार पर पुलिस ने कार्रवाई की। मंगलवार रात केशियाड़ी थाना पुलिस ने भीममेला इलाके से देवांशु घोष नामक एक युवक को गिरफ्तार किया। पीड़िता की शिकायत के आधार पर आरोपित के खिलाफ (पॉक्सो) अधिनियम के तहत मामला दर्ज किया गया है। बुधवार दोपहर आरोपित को खड़गपुर महकमा अदालत में पेश किया गया, जहां अदालत ने उसे तीन दिनों की पुलिस हिरासत में भेजने का निर्देश दिया। पुलिस सूत्रों के अनुसार, पूरे मामले की गंभीरता से जांच की जा रही है और पीड़िता के बयान व अन्य साक्ष्यों के आधार पर आगे की कानूनी प्रक्रिया अपनाई जाएगी। घटना सामने आने के बाद इलाके में सनसनी फैल गई है। स्थानीय लोगों ने आरोपित के खिलाफ कड़ी कार्रवाई की मांग की है। पुलिस का कहना है कि नाबालिग से जुड़े मामलों में कानून के तहत सख्त कदम उठाए जाएंगे।

The Latest: Trump administration looks to rebuild critical mineral supply chain
content: President Donald Trump’s administration is expected to unveil its grandest plan yet to rebuild supply chains of critical minerals needed for everything from jet engines to smartphones, likely through purchase agreements with partners on top of creating a $12 billion U.S. strategic reserve to help counter China’s dominance . Vice President JD Vance is set to deliver a keynote address Wednesday at a meeting Secretary of State Marco Rubio is hosting with officials from several dozen European, Asian and African nations. The U.S. is expected to sign deals on supply chain logistics, though details haven't been revealed. Rubio met Tuesday with foreign ministers from South Korea and India to discuss critical minerals mining and processing.

title: US futures mixed early as tech sector stabilizes after another massive sell-off
content: U.S. markets were mixed early Wednesday as technology stocks stabilized following another selloff. Futures for the S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.2% before the opening bell. Futures for the tech-heavy Nasdaq, which had the biggest decline on Tuesday, ticked down 0.2%.
